name: Morphing Knave
skills: Acrobatics +8, Animal Handling +11, Investigation +6, Perception +7, Stealth +12

traits.name: Feline Grace
traits.desc: The knave has a climb speed equal to its movement speed and does not take fall damage from heights less than 30 feet. In addition, the knave's footsteps are completely silent.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The knave deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the knave that isn't incapacitated and the knave doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The knave is a 3th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The knave has the following druid spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): mending, thorn whip * 1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, jump, longstrider * 2nd level (2 slots): darkvision, enhance ability, locate object

traits.name: Wild Shape - Cat (2/Short Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the knave transforms into a cat for up to two hours. When the cat is reduced to 0 hit points, the knave reverts to its normal form, with any excess damage carrying over to the knave's hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knave makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Steel Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.
